member.name: T:libgp4.GP4Creator
member.summary: A Small Class For Creating new .gp4 Files From Raw PS4 Gamedata, With A Few Options Related To .pkg Creation.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.CreateBaseElements(libgp4.GP4Creator.SfoParser,libgp4.GP4Creator.PlaygoParameters,System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Create Base .gp4 Elements (Up To The Start Of The chunk_info Node).
- psproject
- volume
- volume_type
- volume_id
- volume_ts
- package
- chunk_info

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.CreateFilesElement(System.Int32,System.String[][],System.String[],System.String,System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Create "files" Element Containing File Destination And Source Paths, Along With Whether To Enable PFS Compression.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.CreateRootDirectoryElement(System.String,System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Create "rootdir" Element Containing The Game's File Structure through A Listing Of Each Directory And Subdirectory

member.summary: Create "chunks" Element

member.summary: Create "scenarios" Element

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.BuildGp4Elements(System.Xml.XmlDocument,System.Xml.XmlNode[],System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Xml.XmlNode,System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Build .gp4 Structure And Save To File
member.returns: Time Taken For Build Process

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.FileShouldBeExcluded(System.String)
member.summary:
Check Whether The filepath Containts A Blacklisted String.
Checks Both A Default String[] Of Blacklisted Files, As Well As Any User Blacklisted Files/Folders.
member.returns: True If The File in filepath Shouldn't Be Included In The .gp4

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.SkipPfsCompressionForFile(System.String)
member.summary:
Check Whether Or Not The File At filepath Should Have Pfs Compression Enabled.
This Is Almost Certainly Incomplete. Need More Brain Juice.
member.returns: True If Pfs Compression Should Be Enabled.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.SkipChunkAttributeForFile(System.String)
member.summary:
Check Whether Or Not The File At filepath Should Have The "chunks" Attribute.
[This Is Almost Certainly Incomplete. Need More Brain Juice.]
member.returns: True If The Chunk Attribute Should Be Skipped.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
Initialize A New Instance Of The GP4Creator Class With Which To Build A New .gp4 Project With Various Settings.
Allows For The Editing Of Various Options Before .gp4 Creation.
member.param: The Folder Containing The Gamedata To Create A .gp4 Project File For.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.#ctor
member.summary:
Initialize A New Instance Of The GP4Creator Class With Which To Build A New .gp4 Project With Various Settings.
Allows For The Editing Of Various Options Before .gp4 Creation.
(A Valid GamedataFolder Must Be Set Prior To Creating The .gp4 Project File)

member.name: T:libgp4.GP4Creator.SfoParser
member.summary: Class For Reading Parameters Reqired For .gp4 Creation From The param.sfo File (CUSA1234-example\sce_sys\param.sfo)

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.SfoParser.#ctor(libgp4.GP4Creator,System.String)
member.summary:
Parse param.sfo For Required .gp4 Variables.
Sets The Following Values:
parameter_labels
app_ver
version
category
title_id
content_id(Read Again For Error Checking)
member.param: Current GP4 Creator Incstance (For Logging With Current Verbosity Settings 'n Shit)
PS4 Project Folder Containing The sce_sys Subfolder

member.name: T:libgp4.GP4Creator.PlaygoParameters
member.summary: Class For Reading Chunk & Scenario Data Used In .gp4 Creation From The playgo-chunk.dat File (CUSA1234-example\sce_sys\playgo-chunk.dat)

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.PlaygoParameters.#ctor(libgp4.GP4Creator,System.String)
member.summary:
Parse param.sfo For Required .gp4 Variables.
Sets The Following Values:
chunk_count
chunk_labels
scenario_count
scenario_types
scenario_labels
initial_chunk_count
scenario_chunk_range
default_id
content_id

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.PlaygoParameters.ConvertbufferToStringArray(System.Byte[],System.String[])
member.summary: Parse The Individual Strings From An Array Of Strings, Seperated By A Null Byte.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.DefaultBlacklist
member.summary: Names Of Files That Are Always To Be Excluded From .gp4 Projects By Default.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.extra_files
member.summary: List Of Additional Files To Include In The Project, Added by The User.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.WLog(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Output Log Messages To A Custom Output Method (GP4Creator.LoggingMethod(string)), And/Or To The Console If Applicable.
Duplicates Message To Standard Console Output As Well.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.DLog(System.Object)
member.summary: Console Logging Method.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.VerifyGP4(System.String,System.String,libgp4.GP4Creator.SfoParser)
member.summary: Check Various Parts Of The Parsed gp4 Parameters To Try And Find Any Possible Errors In The Project Files/Structure.

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.SfoParams
member.summary: An Array Of Parameters Parsed From The param.sfo File In The Application/Patch's System Folder (sce_sys\param.sfo)

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.PlaygoData
member.summary: An Array Of Parameters Parsed From The playgo-chunk.dat File In The Application/Patch's System Folder (sce_sys\playgo-chunk.dat)

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.GamedataFolder
member.summary: Root Path Of The PS4 Package Project The .gp4 Is To Be Created For. (Should Contain At Least An Executable And sce_sys Folder)

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.Keystone
member.summary:
Include The Keystone File Used For Savedata Creation/Usage In The .gp4's File Listing.
Including The Original Is Recommended To Maintain Support For Savedata Created By The Original Application.
(True By Default)

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.Passcode
member.summary:
The 32-bit Key Used To Encrypt The .pkg. Required For Extraction With orbis-pub-chk.
(No Effect On Dumping)

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.BlacklistedFilesOrFolders
member.summary: An Array Containing The Names Of Any Files Or Folders That Are To Be Excluded From The .gp4 Project.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.BasePkgPath
member.summary: Path To The Base Application Package The New Package Is To Be Married To.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.AbsoluteFilePaths
member.summary:
Set Whether Or Not To Use Absolute Or Relative Pathnames For The .gp4 Project's File Listing
(True By Default)

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.AppTitle
member.summary: The Application's Default Name, Read From The param.sfo In The Provided Gamedata Folder.

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.AppTitles
member.summary: The Various Titles Of The Application, If There Are Titles Passed The Default (e.g. Title_XX). Left null Otherwise.

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.AppType
member.summary: The Application's Intended Package Type.

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.TargetAppVer
member.summary: Target Application Version.

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.SfoCreationDate
member.summary: Creation Date Of The param.sfo File.

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Creator.SdkVersion
member.summary: The PS4/Orbis SDK Version Of The Application.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.LoggingMethod
member.summary: Optional Method To Use For Logging. [Function(string s)]

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Creator.VerboseLogging
member.summary: Set GP4 Log Verbosity.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Creator.CreateGP4(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Build A New .gp4 Project File For The Provided Gamedata With The Current Options/Settings, And Save It In The Specified OutputDirectory.
First, Parses gamedata_folder\sce_sys\playgo-chunk.dat & gamedata_folder\sce_sys\param.sfo For Parameters Required For .gp4 Creation,
Then Saves All File/Subdirectory Paths In The Gamedata Folder
member.param: Folder In Which To Place The Newly Build .gp4 Project File.
Set Whether Or Not To Abort The Creation Process If An Error Is Found That Would Cause .pkg Creation To Fail, Or Simply Log It To The Standard Console Output And/Or LogOutput(string) Action.

member.name: T:libgp4.GP4Reader
member.summary:
Small Class For Reading Data From .gp4 Projects.
Usage:
1. Create A New Instance To Parse And Return All Relevant Data From The .gp4 File.
2. Use The A Static Method To Read A Specific Attribute From The .gp4, Rather Than Reading Them All To Grab One/A Couple Things.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary:
Create A New Instance Of The GP4Reader Class With A Given .gp4 File.
Parses The Given Project File For All Relevant .gp4 Data. Also Checks For Possible Errors.
(Skips Passed The First Line To Avoid A Version Conflict, As The XmlReader Class Doesn't Like 1.1)
member.param: The Absolute Path To The .gp4 Project File

member.name: T:libgp4.GP4Reader.Scenario
member.summary:
Small Struct For Scenario Node Attributes.
Members:
[string] Type
[string] Label
[int] Id
[int] InitialChunkCount
[string] ChunkRange

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.Scenario.#ctor(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Create A New Scenario Instance From A .gp4 Node
member.param: The XmlReader Instance With The Scneario Node

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.Scenario.Type
member.summary: The Type/Gamemode Of The Selected Game Scenario. (E.G. sp / mp)

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.Scenario.Label
member.summary: The Label/Name Of The Selected Game Scenario.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.Scenario.Id
member.summary: Id/Zero-Based-Index Of The Selected Game Scenario.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.Scenario.InitialChunkCount
member.summary: The Initial Chunk Count For The Selected Game Scenario.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.Scenario.ChunkRange
member.summary:
The Chunk Range For The Selected Game Scenario.
NOTE: No Idea If My Own Tool Creates This Attribute Properly,
But Even If It Doesn't, It Won't Really Matter Unless You're Trying To Burn The Created .pkg To A Disc.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.project_file_blacklist
member.summary: Files That Aren't Meant To Be Added To A .pkg.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.assertion_base
member.summary: Default Assertion Message Text For Formatting.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.use_output_channel
member.summary: Catch DLog Errors, Disabling Whichever Output Threw The Error.

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.sfo_content_id
member.summary: The Content Id In The Named File. (Redundancy To Hopefully Catch A Mismatched Id)

member.name: F:libgp4.GP4Reader.playgo_content_id
member.summary: The Content Id In The Named File. (Redundancy To Hopefully Catch A Mismatched Id)

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.DLog(System.Object)
member.summary: Console Logging Method.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.ELog(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Error Logging Method.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.CheckGP4Path(System.String)
member.summary:
Check Whether Or Not The .gp4 Path Given Points To A Valid File.
Checks It As Both An Absolute Path, And As A Relative Path.
member.param: An Absolute Or Relative Path To The .gp4 File.
member.returns:
The GP4Path, Either Unmodified If Valid On It's Own, Or With The Current Directory Prepended If It's A Valid Relative Path.
string.Empty Otherwise

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.GetAttribute(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Open A .gp4 at The Specified Path and Read The The Value Of "AttributeName" At The Given Parent Node.
member.param: The Absolute Or Relative Path To The .gp4 File.
Attribute's Parent Node.
The Attribute To Read And Return.
member.returns: The Value Of The Specified Attribute If Successfully Found; string.Empty Otherwise.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.GetAttributes(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Open A .gp4 at The Specified GP4Path and Read All Nodes With AttributeName.
member.param: An Absolute Or Relative Path To The .gp4 File
Attribute's Parent Node To Cgeck Every Instance Of
The Attribute To Read And Add To The List
member.returns: A String Array Containing The Value Of Each Instance Of AttributeName, Or An Empty String Array Otherwise.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.GetInnerXMLData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Open A .gp4 at The Specified GP4Path and Read The Inner Xml Contents Of The Specified Node.
member.param: An Absolute Or Relative Path To The .gp4 File.
Attribute's Parent Node To Cgeck Every Instance Of.
member.returns: The Inner Xml Data Of the Given Node If It's Successfully Found; string.Empty Otherwise.

member.name: M:libgp4.GP4Reader.ParseGP4(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary:
Parse Each .gp4 Node For Relevant PS4 .gp4 Project Data.
Throws An InvalidDataException If Invalid Attribute Values Are Found.
(For Example: If Invalid Files Have Been Added To The .gp4's File Listing, Or There Are Conflicting Variables For
The Package Type Because Of gengp4.exe Being A Pile Of Arse.)
Variables Prepended With @ Are Only Read For .gp4 Integrity Verification

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Reader.Timestamp
member.summary:
Volume Timestamp / .gp4 Creation Time
Note:
gengp4.exe Does Not Record The Time, Instead Only The Current YY/MM/DD, And 00:00:00

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Reader.BaseAppPkgPath
member.summary:
(Applies To Patch Packages Only)
An Absolute Path To The Base Game Package The Patch .pkg's Going To Be Married And Installed To.

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Reader.Passcode
member.summary: Password To Be Used In Pkg Creation

member.name: P:libgp4.GP4Reader.IsPatchProject
member.summary: True If The .gp4 Project Is For A Patch .pkg, False Otherwise.

member.summary:
